citeinfo.title: Illinois Zip Code Populations, provided by Kang et al

citeinfo.origin: Joe Holler, Kufre Udoh, Derrick Burt, Peter Kedron, GEOG 323 Class of Spring 2021
citeinfo.title: RPr-Kang-2020

descript.supplinf: The source of this dataset is not clear, and the table provides different values than the one we encounter on the website.

idinfo.useconst: None. Users are advised to read the dataset's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.

cntaddr.address: >Natural History Building, Room 1062 University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign 1301 W Green St

citeinfo.title: NA
citeinfo.othercit: It is unclear which sources are used to derive this dataset, or whether the data was sourced in its current format.

procstep.procdesc:
See code for processing steps in original: https://github.com/cybergis/COVID-19AccessibilityNotebook/tree/main/Data/GridFile
See code for processing steps in reproduction: https://github.com/HEGSRR/RPr-Kang-2020

enttyp.enttypd: Comma Separated Value (CSV) file containing data.

distinfo.distliab: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty.
distinfo.custom: While the original dataset is listed in Kang et al's papr as being "provided by IDPH", this specific dataset (one that includes ICU bed and Ventilator availability for each hospital) could not be accessed online. The IDPH provides state level summaries here: http://www.dph.illinois.gov/covid19/hospitalization-utilization. They do not, however, provide these counts for individual hospitals

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
